webDevelopment.title: Web Development

profile.intro: I'm Angelo, currently I live in Italy working as a software engineer and full-stack developer. My projects include web development, mobile applications, and UI/UX design. Being comfortable with both frontend and backend technologies allows me to rapidly prototype and validate complete solutions.
profile.interests: In my spare time I like to explore new technologies, work on personal projects, and contribute to open source. I'm always excited about new challenges and opportunities to create innovative digital experiences.
profile.imageAlt: Angelo D'Agostino, Software Engineer and Full-Stack Developer
